Detailed Description

MGCFisect is to represent an intersection of a face and a curve.

(MGCSisect csi, MGFace* f) where csi consists of world point, curve parameter, and face(surface) parameter, and f is a face pointer.

Member Function Documentation

int MGCFisect::manifold_dimension (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Return the manifold dimension of the intersection, i.e.

0: when the intersection is a point, 1: when is a curve, 2: when is a surface.

Implements MGisect.
